channel.title: MTP server help
channel.description:
what do i put into the run.bat and compile.bat so it wouldnt show me any errors for the MTP source right now i the compiler tells me javac:file not found usage:javac<options> <source files> use -help for possible list of options any key to continue (i do that then it tells me) files compiled any key to continue( i do that then it closes out)
and for the run.bat it just opens and closes itself out instantly what should i put in those for the edit part?

item.title: MTP server help
item.dc:creator: @911_u_died 911 u died
item.description:
@911_u_died wrote:

what do i put into the run.bat and compile.bat so it wouldnt show me any errors for the MTP source right now i the compiler tells me
javac:file not found
usage:javac
use -help for possible list of options
any key to continue (i do that then it tells me)
files compiled any key to continue( i do that then it closes out)

and for the run.bat it just opens and closes itself out instantly
what should i put in those for the edit part?

Read full topic
